name: Abyssmare (itch)
description:
Description

Abyssmere is a survival horror game that aims to escape from otherworld like school.

In this otherworld, an entity called Oddity roams around and chases the player when it finds the player.

Use items to avoid the Oddity's pursuit and aim for the exit.

Controls

WASD Keys:  Move

Move Mouse:  Look around

Left Shift Key:  Sprint

Left Ctrl Key:  Spuat

Left Mouse Button:  Door Open / Item Pick

Right Mouse Button or 1,2,3,4 Keys:  Use Item

Middle Mouse Button:  Drop Item

Scroll Wheel:  Select Item

ESC or P Keys:  Pause
